name: Array of numbers to string
instruction:
Fix the errors in the `numbersToString` function to make it work correctly.

The function `numbersToString` takes an array of numbers `numbers` and returns a string containing all the numbers in the array, separated by commas.

There must not be a comma at the end of the string.

Examples of running the function:

```javascript
numbersToString([1, 20, 345]); // "1,20,345"
numbersToString([0, 10, -3, 4.67, 0.8, 910]); // "0,10,-3,4.67,0.8,910"
numbersToString([77]); // "77"
numbersToString([]); // ""
```
